trait.name: Fragile
entries: If a critical hit is scored against the terracotta warrior, it shatters and is destroyed.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The terracotta warrior is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the terracotta warrior must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the terracotta warrior remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a terracotta statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The terracotta warrior makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
